info.title: Behance API V2 Documentation
info.description: Access the data behind millions of creative projects and users.

get.description: Get the authenticated user's activity feed.

get.summary: Get a user's feed by timestamp
get.description: Get the authenticated user's activity feed from the specified timestamp forward.

parameters.name: onset_ts
parameters.description: Unix timestamp describing the time from which to fetch the activity feed.

get.description: Get membership status of the authenticated user.

post.description: Add the authenticated user to the CCN.

delete.description: Remove the authenticated user from the CCN.

get.description: Search and filter collections.

post.description: Create a collection of projects.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the collection to be created.

parameters.name: projects
parameters.description: A pipe delimited string of integer project IDs to add to the collection.

get.description: Get a single collection.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the collection to be created.

parameters.name: privacy
parameters.description: The collection's privacy setting.

get.description: List projects belonging to the specified collection.

post.description: Add projects to a collection.

parameters.name: projects
parameters.description: A pipe delimited string of integer project IDs to add to the collection.

delete.description: Remove a project from a collection.

get.description: List the owners of the collection.

post.description: Add an owner to the collection.

parameters.name: coowner
parameters.description: The integer user ID to add as a collection owner.

delete.description: Remove an owner from the collection.

get.summary: Get a list of top users
get.description: Get a list of top users.
Retrieve a full list of creative fields.
Get recommended projects for the authenticated user.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of projects to return per page.

parameters.name: styles
parameters.description: Set to 1 to include project styles with each result.

parameters.name: appreciated
parameters.description: Set to 1 to include the authenticated user's appreciation status with each result.

parameters.name: colors
parameters.description: Set to 1 to include project colors data with each result.

parameters.name: featured_on
parameters.description: Set to 1 to include project feature data with each result.

parameters.name: card
parameters.description: Set to 1 to receive a limited representation of the user.

get.description: List galleries.
Get a single gallery.

post.description: Follow a gallery on behalf of the authenticated user.

delete.description: Unfollow a gallery on behalf of the authenticated user.

get.description: Get a list of countries.
Get a list of regions.

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: The country code to retrieve regions from.

get.description: Get a list of cities.

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: The country code to retrieve regions from.

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: The region/state abbreviation to retrieve cities from.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: A query string to match the city name against.

get.description: Get subscription status for upcoming live video notifications.

post.description: Subscribe to live video notifications on behalf of the authenticated user.

delete.description: Unsubscribe from live video notifications on behalf of the authenticated user.

get.description: Get a list of live videos.
Get a list of live video replays.

parameters.name: creative_category
parameters.description: A creative category ID to filter the results by.

parameters.name: num
parameters.description: The number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: max_start_time
parameters.description: The date/time of the most recent replay.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The result page number of the results.

get.description: Get a live video.
Get notifications for the authenticated user.
Get the total number of unread notifications for the authenticated user.
Get a single notification.
Get a list of project comment notifications for the specified project.
Get the total number of unread comment notifications for the specified project.
Get invitation notifications for the authenticated user.

put.description: Accept an invitation on behalf of the authenticated user.

delete.description: Decline an invitation on behalf of the authenticated user.

post.description: Complete onboarding on behalf of the authenticated user.

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description: A pipe delimited string of integer category IDs.

post.description: Create a project.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the collection to be created.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A pipe delimited string of creative fields.

parameters.name: background_color
parameters.description: The background color for the project. A color hex code.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: A pipe delimited string of search tags.

parameters.name: conceived_on
parameters.description: Unix epoch time in seconds representing when the project was idealized.

parameters.name: tools
parameters.description: A pipe delimited string of tool integer IDs.

parameters.name: credits
parameters.description: A pipe delimited string of user integer IDs to credit on the project.

parameters.name: coowners
parameters.description: A pipe delimited string of user integer IDs to be added as co-owners of the project.

parameters.name: teams
parameters.description: A pipe delimited string of team integer IDs to associate with the project.

parameters.name: privacy
parameters.description: The collection's privacy setting.

parameters.name: visible_to
parameters.description: A pipe delimited string of user integer IDs to limit the project's visibility to.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the collection to be created.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A pipe delimited string of creative fields.

parameters.name: background_color
parameters.description: The background color for the project. A color hex code.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: A pipe delimited string of search tags.

parameters.name: conceived_on
parameters.description: Unix epoch time in seconds representing when the project was idealized.

parameters.name: tools
parameters.description: A pipe delimited string of tool integer IDs.

parameters.name: credits
parameters.description: A pipe delimited string of user integer IDs to credit on the project.

parameters.name: coowners
parameters.description: A pipe delimited string of user integer IDs to be added as co-owners of the project.

parameters.name: teams
parameters.description: A pipe delimited string of team integer IDs to associate with the project.

parameters.name: privacy
parameters.description: The collection's privacy setting.

parameters.name: visible_to
parameters.description: A pipe delimited string of user integer IDs to limit the project's visibility to.

post.description: Clone an existing project.

patch.summary: Reposition a project in the user's portfolio
patch.description: Moves the position of the project in the user's portfolio, relative to another project.

parameters.name: after_project_id
parameters.description: The project ID after which this project should appear in the user's portfolio.

post.description: Create a new project module.

parameters.name: original_width
parameters.description: Applies only to embed modules. The original width of the embed object.

parameters.name: original_height
parameters.description: Applies only to embed modules. The original height of the embed object.

parameters.name: full_bleed
parameters.description: Display the module at full width without any padding. Module must be at least 1400px wide.

parameters.name: html
parameters.description: Can be basic HTML or plain text. Required when creating a text or embed module.

parameters.name: source_url
parameters.description: Source URL of the image/video in our temporary S3 bucket. Required for video, audio, and image modules.

parameters.name: original_width
parameters.description: Applies only to embed modules. The original width of the embed object.

parameters.name: original_height
parameters.description: Applies only to embed modules. The original height of the embed object.

parameters.name: width_unit
parameters.description: The unit of measurement used in the original_width key

parameters.name: full_bleed
parameters.description: Display the module at full width without any padding. Module must be at least 1400px wide.

parameters.name: html
parameters.description: Can be basic HTML or plain text. Required when creating a text or embed module.

post.description: Generates a signed URL and object key with which a client can upload binary data to our temporary S3 bucket. Data lives in this bucket for up to 24 hours.

parameters.name: extension
parameters.description: The file extension of the asset to be uploaded.

post.description: Initiate a multipart upload. This is the first step of the multipart upload flow.

parameters.name: extension
parameters.description: The file extension of the asset to be uploaded.

post.summary: Generate a presigned multipart S3 URL
post.description: Generate a presigned multipart S3 URL.

parameters.name: part_number
parameters.description: The part number of the object to be uploaded. This should be 1 if it is the first part, 2 if it is the second, and so on. These numbers are used to reconstruct the object on AWS's side.

post.description: Completes a multipart upload after all parts have been uploaded.

post.summary: Abort an in progress multipart upload
post.description: Abort an in progress multipart upload.

get.description: Search and filter projects.
Get project drafts for the authenticated user.
Get a single project.
Get the comments associated with a specific project.
Get the collections associated with a specific project.

post.description: View a project on behalf of the authenticated user.
Appreciate a project on behalf of the authenticated user.

delete.description: Unappreciate a project on behalf of the authenticated user.
Remove a credited user from a project.

post.description: Report an entity as spam to be reviewed by the moderation team.

parameters.name: entityType
parameters.description: The entity type to submit a report against.

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: The entity ID to submit a report against.

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description: The entity type to submit a report against. Acceptable values include 10 (copyright), 12 (offensive content), 14 (trademark infringement), 15 (adult content), 16 (privacy issue), and 18 (spam).

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: An arbitrary message supplied by the user or application submitting the report.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: If not supplying an access token, an email address belonging to the person reporting the offense.

get.description: Get the authenticated user's browser settings.

post.description: Modify the authenticated user's browser settings.

get.description: Search for tags.

post.description: Create a tag.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the collection to be created.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: A pipe delimited string of integer tag category IDs.

get.description: Retrieve the talent provisioning level for the authenticated user.
Retrieve the job searches owned by the authenticated user.
Get a single job listing.
Get a list of candidates for the specified job listing.

patch.description: Get a list of recommended candidates.

get.description: Search and filter teams.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The query to search against

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: The direction in which the results should be returned

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The result page number of the results.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of results to return per page

post.description: Create a team.

get.description: Get a single team.

post.description: Increment the view count for the specified team by one.

get.description: Get projects belonging to the specified team.
Get a list of all members in a team.

post.description: Add members to a team with a role.

parameters.name: user_ids
parameters.description: A comma delimited string of integer user IDs

patch.description: Modify a team member's role or position in the member list.

parameters.name: after_id
parameters.description: The integer ID of the user to place this user after in the member list

get.description: Get a list of all followers of a team.

post.description: Follow a team on behalf of the authenticated user.

delete.description: Unfollow a team on behalf of the authenticated user.

get.description: Get a list of team projects.

post.description: Add one or more projects to a team

delete.description: Remove a project from the team.

get.description: Search and filter users.
Get a single user.
Get the authenticated user.
Get a user's live streams.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of projects to return per page.

post.description: Create a live stream.

get.description: Get a live stream.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma delimited string of extra fields ("lftoken") to include with the stream.

parameters.name: is_live
parameters.description: Toggle the live stream on or off.

parameters.name: is_chat_on
parameters.description: Toggle the live stream chat on or off.

get.description: Get a user's projects.

post.description: Follow the user defined in the route path on behalf of the authenticated user.

delete.description: Unfollow the user defined in the route path on behalf of the authenticated user.

get.description: Get a user's followers.
Get a list of users the specified user is following.
Get a user's stats.
Get a user's teams.
Get a user's work experience.
Get a list of projects the user has appreciated.
Get a list of the user's collections.

post.summary: Enable a flag on a user
post.description: Enable a flag on a user
Increment the view count on the given user's profile.

get.summary: Get a user's work in progress
get.description: Get a user's work in progress.

get.summary: Get a work in progress' segments
get.description: Get a work in progress' segments.

post.description: Create a segment.

parameters.name: segment_source_url
parameters.description: A URL for the segment's media on our temporary S3 bucket.

parameters.name: poster_source_url
parameters.description: A URL for the poster source (when media is a video).

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: The duration of media in milliseconds.

parameters.name: is_mature
parameters.description: Mark this segment as containing mature content.

parameters.name: annotation_source_url
parameters.description: A URL representing the transparent PNG annotation overlay.

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: The latitude where the segment was created.

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: The latitude where the segment was created.

parameters.name: session_id
parameters.description: Optional session ID for logging purposes.

get.description: Get a work in progress segment.

delete.description: Delete a work in progress segment.

get.description: Get a list of reactions left on a segment.
Get a list of viewers of a segment. The owner of the segment is not included in the list. This list can only be viewed by the story owner.

post.description: Mark the segment viewed by the authenticated user and increment the segment's view count by one.

get.summary: Get a list of segment search filters
get.description: Search segments regardless of work in progress affiliation.

get.summary: Get a list of works in progress
get.description: Get a list of works in progress.

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: The earliest unix timestamp of the works in progress.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of projects to return per page.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The result page number of the results.

post.description: Update a user's public profile.

parameters.name: first_name
parameters.description: The user's first name

parameters.name: last_name
parameters.description: The user's last name

parameters.name: occupation
parameters.description: The user's occupation

parameters.name: company
parameters.description: The user's company/employer

parameters.name: location_id
parameters.description: An ID representing the user's location

parameters.name: website
parameters.description: The user's website

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: The user's city of residence

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: The user's state of residence

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The user's country of residence

post.description: Update a user's avatar.

parameters.name: source_url
parameters.description: Source URL of the image/video in our temporary S3 bucket. Required for video, audio, and image modules.

location.description: The future location in S3 of the asset to be uploaded.

sections.description: An object with arbitrary string key/value pairs representing the sections that appear on a user's profile.

data.description:
The data pertaining to the notification. While "project" and "actor" are
provided as example object properties here, this key may also be "false"
or contain other properties depending on the notification type.

key.description: The S3 object key name generated for the asset to be uploaded.

location.description: The future location in S3 of the asset to be uploaded.
The future location in S3 of the asset to be uploaded.

fields.description: An object where the keys are the creative field IDs and the values are the string representation.

location.description: The future location in S3 of the asset to be uploaded.

is_following.description: Will be 1 if the authenticated user is following the team, and 0 if not.

is_member.description: Will be 1 if the authenticated user is a member of the team, and 0 if not.

key.description: The S3 object key name generated for the asset to be uploaded.

location.description: The future location in S3 of the asset to be uploaded.

is_viewed.description: True if the authenticated user has viewed the segment, false otherwise.

short_url.description: A shortened deep link to view the segment.

duration_millis.description: The duration of the video or image in milliseconds.

is_viewed.description: True if the authenticated user has viewed the segment, false otherwise.

short_url.description: A shortened deep link to view the segment.

key.description: The S3 object key name generated for the asset to be uploaded.
